title: Police probe St Pancras assault as video appearing to show Tommy Robinson at station
description: Transport police are investigating an incident at the London station it says left a man with serious injuries.
content:
Police probe St Pancras assault as video appears to show Tommy Robinson at station
The clip does not show how the man ended up on the floor. Robinson, 42, whose real name is Stephen Yaxley-Lennon, has not publicly commented on the video.

title: Man arrested after two stabbed to death at Bermondsey business
description: A man, aged 31, is arrested following the stabbing deaths of two people in south-east London.
content:
Arrest made after two killed in quadruple stabbing
A man has been arrested on suspicion of murder after two men were killed and another two were injured in a stabbing at a business in south-east London.

title: Ozzy Osbourne’s funeral procession to pass through Birmingham city centre
description: The Black Sabbath singer’s hearse will travel along Broad Street to Black Sabbath Bridge in his home city on Wednesday
content:
Ozzy Osbourne’s funeral cortege is to pass through his home city of Birmingham on Wednesday.
